How to Cite
===========

If you use **PyQuake3D** in a publication, or wish to refer to it, please cite the following paper:

.. code-block:: text

   Tang, R., Gan, L., Li, F., & Dal Zilio, L. (2025).
   PyQuake3D: A Python tool for 3-D earthquake sequence simulations of seismic and aseismic slip. 
   *Journal of Geophysical Research: Machine Learning and Computation.*
   https://doi.org/10.1029/2025JH000871

---

**BibTeX entry**

.. code-block:: bibtex

   @article{tang2025pyquake3d,
     author  = {Tang, R. and Gan, L. and Li, F. and Dal Zilio, L.},
     title   = {PyQuake3D: A Python tool for 3-D earthquake sequence simulations of seismic and aseismic slip},
     journal = {Journal of Geophysical Research: Machine Learning and Computation},
     volume  = {2},
     pages   = {e2025JH000871},
     year    = {2025},
     doi     = {10.1029/2025JH000871}
   }
